Sequence Information.Peptide Name: VpDef (V. philippinarum defensin; natural AMPs; mollusca/molluscs/mollusks, marine invertebrates, animals; UCSS1a; 4S=S)

Literature Information.Literature: 65.3% SIMILAR TOMCdef.Activity: Recombinant peptides is active against Gram+ bacteria S. aureus (MIC 25-50 uM), M. luteus (MIC 6.25-12.5 uM), Gram- bacteria V. anguillarum, E. cloacae, P. putida (MIC 25-50 uM), P. mirabilis (MIC 50-100 uM), E. aerogenes (MIC 12.5-25 uM), and V. splendidus (MIC 50-100 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Zhang L, Yang D, Wang Q, Yuan Z, Wu H, Pei D, Cong M, Li F, Ji C, Zhao J.2015
Literature Information.Title: A defensin from clam venerupis philippinarum: molecular characterization, localization, antibacterial activity, and mechanism of action
